medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced sharp mid-epigastric pain starting around midnight last night, lasting until presentation to the ED at approximately 4 AM. The pain was accompanied by nausea and several episodes of non-bloody/non-bilious vomiting. The patient denies diarrhea. Symptoms have significantly resolved since receiving IV morphine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Schwanoma in the right neck (diagnosed in ___, scheduled for Neurosurgery referral)
medical_history.family_history: Father: HTN, CAD. No history of cancers or autoimmune disorders.
